summary: Provides a set of helper utilities used throughout the function‑call leaderboard project, handling tasks such as file discovery, content loading, language and format detection, relevance classification for multi‑turn interactions, test‑category extraction, and JSON‑compatible serialization and writing.
business_intent: Support the evaluation pipeline of the function‑call leaderboard by simplifying data preprocessing, categorisation, and storage operations required for benchmarking language models on function‑calling tasks.
